data.name: Boo!
data.detailed_description:
The hero's story unfolds in a small town in which, due to mysterious circumstances, plants mutated into evil monsters. Sinister plants terrify and fear, destroying everything in their path. But what is it? Revenge on humanity? Or someone else's handiwork? Matt will have to find out what is behind such an unprecedented event and find the cause of what happened.

Exciting missions and crazy shootout with numerous and interesting opponents. Assembling abilities will allow you to complete tasks in a variety of ways. Collect and combine upgrades to suit your playstyle. Make your way to the end of the story to find out the secret and save humanity from monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
